job.title: Manager, Statistical Programming (FTE/Remote)
job.description: ltpgtClinical Resource Network CRN is working with a growing bicoastal oncology pharma that has an immediate need for an FTEbased Manager of Statistical Programming The selected candidate will generate TLGsreports create SDTMADaM datasets develop macros validate output support ISSsISEs and contribute to in houseoutsourced studies Our client prefers local or quasi local candidates but is open to the right 100 WFH candidate as wellltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtEssential Duties and ResponsibilitiesltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtServe as Leader for all SAS Programming activities ltligtltligtManage resource allocation and budgeting for assigned projectsltligtltligtResolve issues for complex SAS programming dutiesltligtltligtInteract with global regulatory bodiesltligtltligtCollaborate with CROsltligtltligtDevelop MacrosltligtltligtKey contributor in the development of new processes or revision of existing processesltligtltligtProfessional development to enhance knowledge skills communication scientific methodology operational efficiency and compliance with policies regulations and corporate standards and processesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtRequired Education and ExperienceltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in Computer Science MathStatistics or related degreeltligtltligt57 years of Clinical Statistical Programming experience in a CRO or sponsor environment ltligtltligtStrong TLF SDTM and ADaM experience ltligtltligtExperience working in a Lead Programming capacityltligtltligtPrevious line management experience preferredltligtltligtPrevious oncology andor submissions experience is a major plus but not requiredltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtIf this position sounds like a good fit for you Apply Nowltstronggtltpgt
